title: Are women who do Itikaf in the masjid more rewarded than the women who stay home? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: do women in etiquette have higher rewards than others at home so i presume the sister is asking that if they were to go to the did as a woman perform the etiquette there while there are other women at home who don't go to the i mean no no no the answer the answer is women staying home are highly and more rewarded than women who go for etika and there is no doubt in that at all you
